AT.name: Justice Chronicles
AT.description: Das ultimative, klassische Rollenspiel, in dem ein junger Ritter das Schicksal durch die Dunkelheit bekämpfen muss, die sich in der Historie verborgen hält.. Kline, ein Novize der Hochwild-Ritter, wurde zur Aufklärung nach Laft, in das Erd-Tiefen-Reich, entsandt, wo er auf Alia trifft, eine Kampfmaid, die schreckliche Verwundungen erlitten hat und die dem Tode nah ist. Um ihr zu helfen, schließt er einen Pakt mit Rooselevy, dem Gott des Todes. Alia überlebt, aber der junge Ritter muss im Gegenzug sein Leben aufgeben... In einer Welt, die am Rand des Krieges steht, muss dieses Duo neuer Freunde gegen das Schicksal selbst antreten, um die Welt von der stetig weiter hervorkriechenden Dunkelheit zu retten, die alles zu verschlingen droht und das Gleichgewicht der Welt, ein für alle Mal wieder herzustellen. Das Spiel bietet 40 Stunden einzigartigen Spielvergnügens, eine umfangreiche Story, in der sich eine große Vielfalt von Charakteren und Feinden mischen, sowie viele weitere faszinierende Elemente, wie mächtige Meteoriten, die zusammen mit der Spielfigur wachsen, animierte, rundenbasierte Kämpfe, eine große Anzahl an Nebenquests, Sammeln von Materialien, Waffenherstellung und kunstvolle 8-Bit -Punkt-Grafiken. Justice Chronicles gelingt es wirklich, das Wesen eines wahren Rollenspiels einzufangen!

AU.name: Justice Chronicles
AU.description: Ultimate classic RPG where a young knight must fight destiny through the darkness that lurks in history! Kline, a novice High Beast Knight is sent on reconnaissance into Laft, the Earth-Depths, where he comes across Alia, a Battle Maiden who has suffered terrible injuries and is close to death. In order to help her, he forms a partnership with the God of Death, Rooselevy. Alia lives, but in return the young knight must give up his life... In a world on the brink of war, the newly acquainted duo must fight destiny itself in order to save the world from the ever creeping darkness that is threatening to consume everything, and once and for all restore the balance of the world. Featuring 40 hours of unique gameplay, a rich storyline mixed with a large variety of characters and enemies, as well as many more intriguing features such as powerful meteorites that grow with the character, animated turn-based battles, a large quantity of side quests, material collection, weapon crafting, and beautiful 8-bit dot artwork, Justice Chronicles really captures the essence of a true Role Playing Game!

BG.name: Justice Chronicles
BG.description: Ultimate classic RPG where a young knight must fight destiny through the darkness that lurks in history! Kline, a novice High Beast Knight is sent on reconnaissance into Laft, the Earth-Depths, where he comes across Alia, a Battle Maiden who has suffered terrible injuries and is close to death. Featuring 40 hours of unique gameplay, a rich storyline mixed with a large variety of characters and enemies, as well as many more intriguing features such as powerful meteorites that grow with the character, animated turn-based battles, a large quantity of side quests, material collection, weapon crafting, and beautiful 8-bit dot artwork, Justice Chronicles really captures the essence of a true Role Playing Game!

BE.name: Justice Chronicles
BE.description: Le suprême classique du RPG où un jeune chevalier doit lutter contre tous parmi l'obscurité cachée dans l'histoire ! Kline, l'apprenti de Haute Bête Chevalier est envoyé en reconnaissance dans Laft, la profondeur du monde, où il connait Alia, une fille guerière qui a souffert de terribles blessures et est proche de la morte. Pour l'aider, il forme un partenariat avec le Dieu de la Mort, Roosevely. Alia vit, mais en retour, Kline doit renoncer à sa vie... Dans un monde au bord de la guerre, le duo, nouvellement formé, doit lutter contre le propre destin pour sauver le monde de la bien pire obscurité qui menace toute détruire, et enfin rétablir l'équilibre du monde. Comportant 40 heures de jeu unique, une histoire riche mélangée avec une grande variété de personnages et ennemis, ainsi que de nombreuses possibilités les plus intrigantes, telles que les météorites qui poussent avec le personnage, les batailles tour à tour animés, une grande quantité de quêtes secondaires, collection de matériels, création d'armes, et un très bel art sur le 8-bits, le jeu capture vraiment l'essence d'un véritable RPG !

ES.name: Justice Chronicles
ES.description: ¡Lucha contra las tinieblas del destino en este épico juego de rol clásico! Kline, un joven caballero de los High Beast, viene enviado por una misión de exploración a Laft, un mundo subterráneo, donde conoce a Alia, una guerrera que está a punto de morir después de un conflicto. Para ayudarla, Kline decide hacer un pacto con el dios de la muerte, Rooselevy. Alia sobrevive, pero el joven tendrá que ofrecer su vida a cambio. En un mundo al borde de la guerra, el nuevo duo luchará contra el destino para salvarlo de la imbasión de las tinieblas que van tragando todo a su paso, y rectificar el equilibrio del mundo de una vez por todas. Justice Chronicles ofrece más de 40 horas de juego, una historia llena de personajes originales, y otras muchas funciones fascinantes, como potentes meteoritos que se desarrollan junto a los personajes, combates por turnos, gran cantidad de exploraciones, materiales para desarrollar armas, y una bonita gráfica basada en el arte 8-bit. Con estas características el juego captura la esencia de un verdadero juego de rol.

IT.name: Justice Chronicles
IT.description: Combatti le tenebre del destino in questo classico gioco di ruolo epico! Kline, un giovane Cavaliere degli High Beast, viene inviato tramite una missione di esplorazione a Laft, un mondo sotterraneo, dove incontra Alia, una ragazza guerriera che si trova in fin di vita dopo un conflitto. Per aiutarla, Kline decide di fare un patto con il dio della morte, Rooselevy. Alia sopravvive, ma in cambio il giovane cavaliere dovrà offire la propria vita... In un mondo sull'orlo della guerra, la nuova coppia combattererà il destino per salvare il mondo dall'invasione delle tenebre oscure che consumano ogni cosa, e cambiare l'equilibrio del mondo una volta per tutte. Justice Chronicles offre più di 40 ore di gioco, una storia ricca piena di personaggi originali, così come tante altre funzioni attraenti come potenti meteoriti che si evolvono insieme ai personaggi, combattimenti a turno animati, numerose quantità di subquest, collezioni di materiali per sviluppare armi, e una bella grafica basata sulla tecnica a 8-bit. Con queste caratteristiche, il gioco ha tutte le carte in regola per essere un vero gioco di ruolo!

NL.name: Justice Chronicles
NL.description: Deze ultieme klassieke RPG volgt het verhaal van een jonge ridder die tegen het lot vecht in een wereld waar duisternis schuilt in de geschiedenis! Kline, een jonge High Beast Ridder wordt op verkenningsmissie gestuurd naar Laft, de onderwereld, hier ontmoet hij Alia, een jonge krijgsvrouw die ernstig gewond is en op de rand van de dood balanceert. Om haar te helpen vormt hij een partnerschap met de God van de Dood, Rooselevy. Alia overleeft, maar in ruil moet hij zijn leven opgeven… In een wereld die op de rand van oorlog staat moet het nieuwe duo vechten tegen het lot zelf om de wereld te redden van de alsmaar naderende duisternis die alles dreigt over te nemen en zo voor eens en altijd de balans in de wereld te herstellen. Meer dan 40 uur unieke gameplay, een diep verhaal met veel verschillende karakters en vijanden, en nog veel meer features zoals krachtige meteorieten die sterker worden met de speler, geanimeerde turn-based gevechten, veel extra missies, grondstoffen verzamelen, wapen upgrades en 8-bit artwork, Justice Chronicles is een echte klassieke Role Playing Game.

Featuring 40 hours of unique gameplay, a rich storyline mixed with a large variety of characters and enemies, as well as many more intriguing features such as powerful meteorites that grow with the character, animated turn-based battles, a large quantity of side quests, material collection, weapon crafting, and beautiful 8-bit dot artwork, Justice Chronicles really captures the essence of a true Role Playing Game!

PT.name: Justice Chronicles
PT.description: Um clássico dos RPGs, em que um jovem guerreiro precisa enfrentar o destino pelas trevas que assombram a história! Kline, um jovem Guerreiro das Feras Nobres, é enviado a uma missão de reconhecimento em Laft, nas Profundezas da Terra, onde ele se depara com Alia, uma Donzela de Guerra que sofreu ferimentos terríveis e está próxima da morte. Para salvá-la, ele se une a Rooselevy, o Deus da Morte. Alia sobrevive, mas em troca ele abre mão de sua própria vida... Em um mundo à beira da guerra, a dupla que acaba de se conhecer precisa enfrentar o destino para salvar o mundo da escuridão iminente que ameaça aniquilar tudo, e assim restaurar o equilíbrio do mundo de uma vez por todas. Com 40 horas de uma jogabilidade única, uma história elaborada que mistura uma ampla gama de personagens e inimigos, bem como muitas outras atrações empolgantes, como poderosos meteoros que crescem junto com os personagens, batalhas por turno com animações, um grande número de missões paralelas, coletas de materiais, criação de armas e um belo trabalho de arte em 8-bits, Justice Chronicles captura a real essência de um RPG!

RU.name: Justice Chronicles
RU.description: Грандиозная классическая ролевая игра, в которой юный рыцарь должен побороть свою судьбу через тьму, что скрывается в истории! Клайн, свежеиспечённый рыцарь ордена Высшего Зверя, отправлен на разведку в Лафт, в Глубины, где он встречает воительницу по имени Алия. Алия тяжело ранена и близка к смерти - чтобы спасти её, Клайн заключает пакт с Богом Смерти, Рууслэви. Девушка вне опасности, но теперь юный рыцарь должен расстаться с жизнью.. Героическая пара вступает в схватку с собственной судьбой, чтобы восстановить нарушенный баланс и спасти мир на грани войны от надвигающейся тени, готовой поглотить всё и вся. Вас ожидает более 40 часов уникального сюжета, насыщенного большим количеством разнообразных персонажей и их злопыхателей, где также присутствуют: могущественные метеориты, растущие в силе вместе с героями; роскошно анимированные пошаговые сражения; побочные квесты; система сбора материалов и создания оружия; очаровательная пиксельная графика в стиле 8бит. Приготовьтесь к невероятным похождениям в мире Хроник Справедливости - квинтэссенции жанра ролевых игр!

SE.name: Justice Chronicles
SE.description: Ultimate classic RPG where a young knight must fight destiny through the darkness that lurks in history! Kline, a novice High Beast Knight is sent on reconnaissance into Laft, the Earth-Depths, where he comes across Alia, a Battle Maiden who has suffered terrible injuries and is close to death. In order to help her, he forms a partnership with the God of Death, Rooselevy. Alia lives, but in return the young knight must give up his life... In a world on the brink of war, the newly acquainted duo must fight destiny itself in order to save the world from the ever creeping darkness that is threatening to consume everything, and once and for all restore the balance of the world. Featuring 40 hours of unique gameplay, a rich storyline mixed with a large variety of characters and enemies, as well as many more intriguing features such as powerful meteorites that grow with the character, animated turn-based battles, a large quantity of side quests, material collection, weapon crafting, and beautiful 8-bit dot artwork, Justice Chronicles really captures the essence of a true Role Playing Game!
